title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. - Call of Pripyat + MISERY 2.1 + Tweaks
description:
This is S.T.A.L.K.E.R. - Call of Pripyat with the latest version of the MISERY mod plus various tweaks and fixes to make the experience more enjoyable, including:

- Les Miserables fixes (less omnipotent AI, better item prices, etc.)
- Lots of added radio songs
- Absolute Nature Lite for better performance
- Re-addition of the HUD minimap
- Stamina slightly increased for all classes
- Improved scopes
- Reduced repair kit prices
- Trade weapons at any condition with fair prices
- Artifact prices greatly increased
- Switch distance reverted to vanilla setting to prevent stutter
- Quieter geiger counter
- Bolt-action sniper rifles less shitty
- TT33 pistol shoots faster
- Vanilla camera settings

I compiled the mod and all of these fixes into a direct-play rar file to avoid the hassle of having to apply all of these tweaks myself in the future, and now I'm sharing it with you. This is the definitive Call of Pripyat experience
